value.title: FAST - Billions of rows with Azure Data Explorer (ADX)
value.excerpt: Have you tried Azure Data Explorer? We look at how ADX can support large amounts of data and query at blazing fast speeds. it truly is BANANAS! And you can try it for FREE!  Connect with Tzvia: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tzvia/ https://twitter.com/tzvia  What is Azure Data Explorer? https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/data-explorer/data-explorer-overview

value.title: Power BI For Report Consumers
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at Power BI for report consumers. Those folks that maybe don't author reports, but just view reports within Power BI. We introduce some basic Power BI concepts and introduce you to areas of the Power BI service to get you familiar with the portal.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
